itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Glove sockets.
- Item Effect: Attack Speed & Casting Speed +1

※ This magic crystal has a low chance of shattering if your Character dies.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.

item.name: Red Battlefield Crystal: Viper
item.desc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Gloves sockets. 
- Item effect: Attack Speed & Casting Speed +1 & Extra Damage against Humans +2
※ Once installed, the crystal might be destroyed upon the character's death.
- The potential of the crystal can be transfused to equipment items through Black Spirit.
- How to Obtain: Heat the Red Essence and Ancient Magic Crystal: Viper together.
